abstract: Sales across the industry were higher last month compared to a year earlier, but the annualized selling rate fell.
snippet: Sales across the industry were higher last month compared to a year earlier, but the annualized selling rate fell.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Shortages of cars made by Toyota and Honda and fewer discounts over all made June the worst month so far this year for sales of new vehicles in the United States, but automakers expressed confidence that the industry would rebound later in the year.

headline.main: In Car Sales, Good Month for Detroit, Not Japan
headline.print_headline: In Car Sales, Good Month For Detroit, Not Japan
